source.description: The panel id of the panel contains the source button.

sourceButton.description: The button id of the source button.

parameters.description: The parameter object declares the mapping of input parameters of a tool function to panel contents or a string.

^$.description: The parameter object's keys must match the target action funtion. The value should be id of a panel that the contents will be used or a string.

output.description: Panel id where the tool function return will be displayed.
